activities: Creating and managing users accounts; managing the visa applications and tourists cards, processing online payment, managing customers relationships and support.
personaldata: no Manually processed data. Type of data collected about Customers :Identity data (name, adress, place and date of birth), passeport information, payment information, bank account information, official documents for visa application, itinerary information, travel information
privacyprograms: self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
